channel.title: Is this a virus
channel.description:
ok, so umm i've noticed for a while now wen ever i turn my computer screen off and turn it back on after a few mins i see sumthing called "3D text" which disappears when i turn the screen on, i havnt gotten a clear look at it.
i recently downloaded kazaa which i think MIGHT be whats hapening. any ideas on what's going on?

item.title: Is this a virus
item.dc:creator: @zamorak_stud zamorak stud

@zamorak_stud wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:16, topic:18485”][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=27904.msg326072#msg326072 date=1161141567]

i dunno, i guess im just rly stupid it didnt turn it on i thought it was working while it turned off and stoped when i turned it on, with out norton im kinda worried about these stuff[br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 08:38:21 PM[/size][hr][quote author=james link=topic=27904.msg321664#msg321664 date=1160981253]
fu superior is a scammer on sythe lewl

james has no rep and is a junior member on moparisthebest lewl

James was reset and can tell the difference between a Screensaver and Virus lewl.
[/quote]

go suck a dick with aids
[/quote]
So just the dick has aids?

And that’s the best you could come up with? I’m sorry i doubted your intelligence. Just be careful not to confuse Msn as a virus either.[/quote]
asshole, he clearly stated he has no antivirus, and he might have a virus, and james, doesnt have to be a cunt and claim that hes a scammer and u shut up its not ur business nor mine

item.title: Is this a virus
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

the fu superior:

i recently downloaded kazaa

Kazaa sucks. 80% of all of the files on it are binded with viruses. If you must use it, make sure you have a heavy-duty virus scanner and scan each file before you open it, and reformat often to get rid of any shit you pick up.

Read full topic
